body:
SELECT SupplierID, Customers, Products
FROM
(SELECT SupplierD, AAA, BBB, CCC
FROM sampletable) p
UNPIVOT
(Products FOR Customers IN
(AAA, BBB, CCC)
)AS example;
GO

SELECT Fonksiyon, MakinaGrup, Aciklama Into xxxOrgatexfonksiyonlar_Unpivot
FROM
( 
Select  Fonksiyon, [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], [6], [8], [10], [21], [30] From  xxxOrgatexfonksiyonlar
) p
UNPIVOT
(Aciklama FOR MakinaGrup IN
([1], [2], [3], [4], [5], [6], [8], [10], [21], [30])
)AS example;
Go


SELECT Groups, MakinaGrup, Aciklama Into xxxOrgatexInfoword_Unpivot
FROM
( 
Select  Groups, infoword1, infoword2, infoword3, infoword4, infoword5, infoword6, infoword7, infoword8, infoword9, infoword10
From  xxxOrgatexInfoword
) p
UNPIVOT
(Aciklama FOR MakinaGrup IN
(infoword1, infoword2, infoword3, infoword4, infoword5, infoword6, infoword7, infoword8, infoword9, infoword10)
)AS example;
GO
